lead_paragraph: The TV Sports column on Wednesday, about a basketball documentary on Kobe Bryant of the Los Angeles Lakers by the director Spike Lee, referred incorrectly to the 1997-98 season for Michael Jordan, who could become the subject of a film by Lee using footage from that season. It was Jordan’s final season with the Chicago Bulls — not his last as a player, which was 2002-3 with Washington.
